I don't believe in his theory yes Micheal so true Most who have worked for State entities are corrupt Major corruption began when Zuma became President. Very true because Zuma has no intelligence .So his ministers and comrades did as Zuma did. I know corruption has always taken place but my goodness nor on a scale such as this. Not only Zuma but the ANC comrades Comrades is a communist term Comrade was used in Cuba when terrorists from Africa were trained in Communist Cuba. They were Terrorists trained by the communist Cubans and Russia Must vote wisely you don't want this country to become a Marxist state like Zimbabwe was under Mugabe who was another terrorist but fortunately for him he was educated in London. I am voting for John Steenhuizen x x great idea much like America There is no harm in trying and it is not like homelands it is a more efficient way of governance and accountability. nope I didn't suggest borders someone else did.

author: Magda Seguin
message: Total nonsense @Val Spiers This man and his entire board was sacked to make way for the Gupta captured under Lyn Brown You know mothing about the dynamic of state capture...so desist from making slanderous comments You obviously never listened as to how many people were harrassed and got death threats Saying that he is lying Really? so you are the judge and jury of state capture now...WOW its a first You said ge has no backbone...proof much...tell us if you have knowledge you add no intelligent convo here blocked I really suffer fools very badly Trolls having a field day @Michael it will be nice tto have the real ANC cadres who are implicated arrested...ie the ministers who followed Gupta orders...that will be a great start but now they are on the list for parliament All those implicated in the Bosasa theft are still free and laughing at tgeir compatriots...Koko is a case in point "@Michael the majority of the people who appeared up till now came forward on their own...they were not subpoenaed...the real culprits have not appeared yet...where is Duduzane I have come to the conclusion that most commenters on this forum never read anything that is already in the public domain about state capture...they comment as if everyone here is a crook The PMFA already showed that VR Laser was a shelf company so Stefan Burger is looking for a scapegoat @Makhosi definitely treason violating his oathvof office South Africa was handed on a platter to the Guptas by Zuma Lyn Brown masterminded the decline of Denel..leaving it in tatters and brilliant minds sacked...those people are now headhunted overseas for their expertise Koko did the same to Eskom... And Moyane did it at SARS too... Dudu at SAA....the list goes on Nine wasted years Anyone under 35 do not even have lived experience yet....it will be chaos...some cant even read and understand an Act of government Judging from what I see on Twitter under 35's are will never be able to govern... @x.x I said most not all...I know brilliant under 35's bit they are only starting out in their careers and is not interested in politics @Derek Main üòÅ yes and what about the fashions I hope that they will be subpoenaed...maybe after Agrizzi testifies again later...I would love to see Mokonyane's denials "You are right The new board that was put there by the Guptas In what universe are we living with Lyn Brown 'not being that bad'? She sacked a brilliant board and replaced them with Gupta lackeys who destroyed Denel...catch a wakeup! Lyn Brown's partner recieved a 4x4 from the Guptas...her son in law was also involved in the SARS debacle with van Rooyens appointment as an 'advisor' "Gigabavis in trouble with the Gupta naturalisation Koko is very active on Twitter...he is blaming everyone but himself What he is explaining is what is defined in the World Bank 2001 State Capture document.. State Capture didn't start in South Africa it is a global political phenomena I encourage you to read Naomi Klein's book called 'Shock Doctrine' True they absolutely did @ Derek Main Honest people's lives was ruined... This was a MO throughout state capture...resign or suspend immediatly Totally against labour law Is 3 months salary a golden handshake? Labour LAW.... In SA we have the BCEA...Basic conditions of employment act...read it...we also have a labour court I understand @Robert Russell it was a free for all...state capture anarchy Sloppiness in their criminality We may end up with a coalition government Bring hulle in M'Lord Attorneys cost money and with 3months salary it's not possible to litigate At national level a coalition may work...we had a national coalition government before I doubt that the ANC will be completely out...too many diehard voters The ANC destroyed the country...future generations will judge us harshly Sad thing is...a lot of youth are believing in the EFF...another doomed party The DA need ethical guidelines...we never know what they are planning inhouse True @Ben ....I was referring to the historical perspective In some countries the streets would have been full of dissent but we have become numb with trauma "The ANC and EFF always blame colonialism This commission is at least giving some a chance to vent and relate their experiences.Judge Zondo's report will have to be concise and lead to arrests Lyn Brown promised him another 5 year contract then fired him....disgusting She has no moral compass His contract was already over in any case @Michael it runs very deep at all levels in government Batho Pale my foot It is so painful but the heartless ANC will deny they did anything wrong...just watch how arrogant they are in parliament The CCMA outcome was not favourable...it should have gone to the Labour court or even civil court All these people need debriefing and counselling with reparations Planeless Pilot has no humanity or compassion I think so too @Ben right now people are blaming Gordhan and the Eskom CEO for load shedding forgetting the huge damage Zuma and the Guptas did
